sources.title: Dear Secret Santa | Full Movie 2023 | Heartfelt Christmas Romantic Drama | Happy Holidays!
sources.description:
Mourning the loss of a friend, Jennifer receives a surprising Christmas card from a secret admirer.   Now that she has a second chance at love, will she be able to take it?
2013.  Stars: Tatyana Ali, Bill Cobbs, Jordin Sparks, Ernie Hudson

metadata.Plot: Beverly Hills banker/workaholic JENNIFER comes home to her small Northern California town just before Christmas when her dad, TED , takes a bad fall while putting up decorations. While home, Jenny begins getting romantic Christmas cards from an unknown admirer, who turns out to be her old neighbor and the unrealized love of her life, JACK. There's just one problem- Jack died in a car accident three years ago.
metadata.Actors: Tatyana Ali, Bill Cobbs, Jordin Sparks
